oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Cowboy Slim Rinehart radio show - Programs 4, 5, 6 - XEG
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Cowboy Slim Rinehart radio show, featuring Cowboy Slim Rinehart (host, performer) listed as programs #4, #5, and #6, broadcast on radio station XEG (Monterrey, Mexico.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cowboy Slim Rinehart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:04) Roaming Cowboy (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (01:13) Cowboy Slim Rinehart expresses his thanks to the audience -- (01:57) They're All Going Home but One (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (04:49) Bury Me Beneath the Willow (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (07:01) Rinehart expresses his thanks to the audience -- (07:29) Make 'Em Say Uncle, Uncle Sam (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (08:51) Carry Me Back to the Lone Prairie [featuring Cowboy Slim Rinehart outro] (Cowboy Slim Reinhart) -- (10:07) Roaming Cowboy (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (11:15) Cowboy Slim Rinehart expresses his thanks to the audience -- (11:49) Nobody's Darling on Earth (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (14:12) Crying Myself to Sleep (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (15:58) Rinehart expresses his thanks to the audience -- (16:26) The Gangster's Warning (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (18:37) Carry Me Back to the Lone Prairie [featuring Cowboy Slim Rinehart outro] (Cowboy Slim Reinhart) -- (19:45) Roaming Cowboy (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (20:55) Cowboy Slim Rinehart expresses his thanks to the audience -- (21:18) A Sinner's Prayer is Never Answered (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (23:03) The Days Are Slipping By (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (25:20) Rinehart thanks the audience and asks the audience to write-in song requests -- (25:51) You're My Darling (Cowboy Slim Rinehart) -- (27:34) Carry Me Back to the Lone Prairie [featuring Cowboy Slim Rinehart outro] (Cowboy Slim Reinhart)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rinehart, Cowboy Slim, 1911-1948;
